title: Door County Beer Festival at Maxwelton Braes Lodge, Baileys Harbor on 4th May, 2024
text: Door County Beer Festival Schedule Sat, 04 May, 2024 at 01:15 pm to Sat, 15 Jun, 2024 at 12:00 pm Location Maxwelton Braes Lodge | Baileys Harbor, Wisconsin Advertisement Tickets are now on sale for the June 15, 2024 Door County Beer Festival!Taste beers from more than 40 Midwestern craft breweries with more than 150 beers to sample at the grounds of About Thyme Farm in Baileys Harbor, where you can spread out on the spacious grounds while you taste great beer, enjoy live music and feast on local food during Father’s Day weekend.A limited number of Early Access tickets – providing early access to all the tasting tents – are available now. Early Access ticket holders will get exclusive access to the grounds from 11 am to noon.All ticket holders receive access to park-and-ride shuttles leaving from the Baileys Harbor Recreation Park and downtown Baileys Harbor. Shuttles will also take you directly to select lodging sponsors.**Tickets are transferable to other persons. We do not need prior notice on transfers. There is a unique QR code on the ticket that will be scanned at the entrance. The name on the ticket doesn't matter so buy tickets as gifts all you want!** Ear? Prepare for an extraordinary experience from June 15, 2024 to June 15, 2024 at Maxwelton Braes Lodge. Join us for Door County Beer Festival, a mesmerizing event that promises to redefine your expectations. From captivating presentations to interactive showcases, this OTHER in Wisconsin, FAIRS / FESTIVALS is designed to leave you inspired and amazed. Join us for this incredible event ?. Advertisement Where is it happening? Maxwelton Braes Lodge, Maxwelton Braes Lodge, Baileys Harbor, United States of AmericaEvent Location & Nearby Stays: Know what’s Happening Next — before everyone else does.
